lead_paragraph: MURRAY--Anne McVoy, 91, of New Canaan, died Saturday, January 23, 2016 at Norwalk Hospital. She was the widow of Paul B. Murray, whom she was married to for 67 years. Anne was born in Chicago, IL on October 8, 1924, second youngest of seven children to John and Marie McVoy. She graduated from Manhattanville College New York with a BA in history. Anne is survived by her eleven children, twenty-three grandchildren and five greatgrandchildren. A Mass of Christian burial will be held Monday, February 1st at 10:30am in St. Thomas More Church, 374 Middlesex Rd., Darien, CT 06820. Burial will be at the convenience of the family. Friends may call Sunday from 3-5pm at Hoyt Funeral Home, 199 Main St., New Canaan, CT 06840. Interment will take place at a later date in Manchester, VT. In lieu of flowers, contributions in Anne's memory can be made to Crudem Foundation, P.O. Box 804, Ludlow, MA 01056. For directions or online condolences, please visit www.hoytfuneralhome.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MURRAY, ANNE MCVOY
